price: Sa [liping] Thamūd [ay may tanda] noong sinabi sa kanila: “Magpakatamasa kayo hanggang sa pansamantala.”
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
